title: What do you need to know to deploy Cassandra in Kubernetes?
description:
Chris Bradford is a product manager at DataStax who's focus is on Kubernetes and how users can utilize Cassandra in this fast moving project. He gives us some deep insights into how we got here and some important details on being successful when deploying Cassandra in your Kubernetes environment. We finish with some predictions on where the next 5-10 years look for cloud native databases. 

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs
